metadata.title: CVE-2024-49988 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ksmbd: add refcnt to ksmbd_conn structWhen sending an oplock break request, opinfo->conn is used,But freed ->conn can be used on multichannel.This patch add a reference count to the ksmbd_conn structso that it can be freed when it is no longer used.
